name: vscompare
description: Clip comparison script. Creates easy frame comparisons between multiple clips.

functions.name: comp
functions.description: Allows an infinite number of clips to be compared. Can compare entire clips, frames, or slices. Visually arranges clips in five ways: continuous clip (A0 B0 A1 B1), vertical stacking, horizontal stacking, mosaic, split (A | B [| C])

functions.name: prep
functions.description: Prepares multiple clips of differing sizes/bit-depths to be compared. Can optionally be used as a simplified resize/ftmc wrapper for one clip.

functions.name: save
functions.description: Writes frames as named files for easy upload to image comparison websites.
